alert.note: Alert for McKenzie; Williams (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 30 at 9:42AM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Missouri River near Williston affecting McKenzie and Williams Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Missouri River near Williston. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, low-lying farmland and access roads to oil well sites near Trenton are flooded. City of Williston does not flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Friday /8:00 AM MDT Friday/ the stage was 22.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this weekend. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
